item.title: 3d Force Directed Graph
item.description: As a small learning-project I made a 3d-force-directed-graph renderer that lets you explore any graph in 3D. My main motivation for this was to learn three.js. Force directed graph Force-directed-graph-algorithms are a set of algorithms that tries to display graphs in an esthetically pleasing way by using concepts from physics. By applying forces between the nodes we can get connected nodes to group together and spread non-connected nodes appart, giving us a clear overview of the graph structure.
